data.name: Box Party
data.detailed_description:
You're invited to the biggest party of the year!
But the food has gone bad, and they're threatening to crash the party, forever!
It's up to you to stop them before it's too late!

Box Party is a cartoony retro FPS where you shoot foods and go to parties.

Also you are a Box.
Along the way you'll find cool weapons to use, fellow partygoers to talk to, optional side quests to complete, and more importantly, plenty of food to fight.


Box Party consists of a short and replayable Story Mode with plenty of optional content to explore, a Challenge Mode filled with dozens of quick, one off levels to beat, and an Endless Mode, where you can party your box to your heart's content. Also, there's a plethora of unlockable hats for you to find in all 3 modes!


Ammo pickups are scarce in Box Party, and health pickups are nigh non-existent. Instead, regain your health and ammo by defeating foods! Combined with low ammo capacity and aggressive foods, you'll need to get a hang of the combat loop in Box Party to do well on higher difficulties.

Here's a list of features to get you interested in Box Party:

  • Choose from multiple playable characters!
  • Fight a wide variety of foods and bosses!
  • Collect your arsenal of unique party themed weaponry!
  • A bunch of secrets for you to try to find! (you won't find em all)
  • Make small talk with NPC's and do neat side quests!
  • Keep track of your high scores!
  • A handy dandy guidebook to help you out!
  • Mod Support! (Thanks to the power of the GZDOOM engine)
  • A playable demo, with the first 3 story levels!

Will you become the Ultimate Party Star?

data.short_description: You've been invited to the biggest party of the year! But the food has gone bad, and are threatening to shut down the party... forever! Only you can stop them!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU capable of running OpenGL 3.3, OpenGLES 2.0, or DirectX 9.0.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your graphics drivers are up to date.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU capable of running Vulkan/OpenGL 4.5.
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your graphics drivers are up to date.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 El Capitan and above
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything capable of running OpenGL 3.3.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 El Capitan and above
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything capable of running OpenGL 4.5.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
